page.title: 11CARING FOR PETS
page.content: I HAVE 6 PETS.MY CAT, JANIE, IS BLACK. WE GROOM HER WITH HER OWN COMB EVERY WEEK OR SO, BUT WHEN SHE'S MOULTING, EVERY EVENING.SHE EATS LOTS OF FOOD, SHE ACTS AS IF SHE IS ALWAYS HUNGRY.JANIE HAS 'WHISKAS'CAT FOOD. I ALSO HAVE A HAMSTER, BUDGIE AND THREE GOLDFISH. MY HAMSTER, HONEY, LIVES IN A CAGE WITH A HOUSE, WHEEL, PEG AND BOTTLE. THE PEG IS FOR HIM TO CHEW AND THE WHEEL IS FOR HIM TO EXERCISE.I CLEAN HIM OUT EVERY WEEK. I LINE THE CAGE WITH NEWSPAPER AND THEN SAWDUST.I FILL HIS HOUSE WITH BEDDING SINCE THAT IS WHERE HE SLEEPS. MY BUDGIE PETER IS A BLUEY COLOUR. HE LIVES IN A CAGE ON A BRACKET ON THE WALL. I CLEAN HIM OUT ONCE A WEEK ALSO. I LINE HIS CAGE WITH SAND AND GRIT. HE ALSO HAS FOOD AND WATER ALL THE TIME.
